languages.text: {n}При слове "наемник" глаза Маражая вспыхивают от бешенства.{/n} "Осторожнее с оборотами речи, мон-кай. Иначе я прямо здесь продемонстрирую тебе свой талант в свежевании заживо".
{n}The word "mercenary" causes Marazhai's eyes to flare in fury.{/n} "Careful with your choice of terms, mon-keigh. Or I will demonstrate my expertise in flaying victims alive, here and now."
languages.original_text: {n}При слове "наемник" глаза Маражая вспыхивают от бешенства.{/n} "Осторожнее с оборотами речи, мон-кай. Иначе я прямо здесь продемонстрирую тебе свой талант в свежевании заживо".

traits.locale_text: {n}The word "mercenary" causes Marazhai's eyes to flare up in fury.{/n} "Careful with your choice of terms, mon-keigh. Or I'll show you my expertise in flaying a person alive right here and now."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

traits.locale_text: {n}The word "mercenary" causes Marazhai's eyes to flare up in fury.{/n} "Careful with your choice of terms, mon-keigh. Or I'll show you my expertise in flaying a person alive right here and now."

languages.text: {n}听到“雇佣兵”这个词时，玛拉斋不禁怒火中烧。{/n}“说话当心点，猴子，否则我现在就让你见识见识我给活人剥皮的本事。”
languages.original_text: {n}The word "mercenary" causes Marazhai's eyes to flare in fury.{/n} "Careful with your choice of terms, mon-keigh. Or I will demonstrate my expertise in flaying victims alive, here and now."

traits.locale_text: {n}听到“雇佣兵”这个词时，玛拉斋不禁怒火中烧。{/n}“说话当心点，猴子，否则我现在就让你见识见识我给活人剥皮的本领。”
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}『傭兵』という言葉に、マラズハイの目に怒りが燃える。{/n}「言葉選びに気をつけろ、モン＝ケイ。それとも、生きたまま皮を剥がす専門技術を、今ここで披露しようか？」
languages.original_text: {n}The word "mercenary" causes Marazhai's eyes to flare in fury.{/n} "Careful with your choice of terms, mon-keigh. Or I will demonstrate my expertise in flaying victims alive, here and now."

traits.locale_text: {n}『傭兵』という言葉に、マラズハイの目に怒りが燃える。{/n}「言葉選びに気をつけろ、モン＝ケイ。それとも、生きたまま皮を剥がす専門技術を、今ここで披露しようか？」
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}La palabra «mercenario» hace que la furia inunde los ojos de Marazhai.{/n} «Cuidado con los términos que utilizas, mon-keigh, o te mostraré mi capacidad de desollar viva a una persona aquí y ahora».
languages.original_text: {n}The word "mercenary" causes Marazhai's eyes to flare in fury.{/n} "Careful with your choice of terms, mon-keigh. Or I will demonstrate my expertise in flaying victims alive, here and now."

traits.locale_text: {n}La palabra «mercenario» hace que la furia inunde los ojos de Marazhai.{/n} «Cuidado con los términos que utilizas, mon-keigh, o te mostraré mi capacidad de desollar viva a una persona aquí y ahora».
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}Das Wort 'Söldner' lässt Marazhais Augen zornig aufblitzen.{/n} "Vorsicht mit Eurer Wortwahl, Chem-Pan-Sey. Sonst zeige ich Euch hier und jetzt, wie erfahren ich darin bin, jemanden bei lebendigem Leib zu häuten."
languages.original_text: {n}The word "mercenary" causes Marazhai's eyes to flare in fury.{/n} "Careful with your choice of terms, mon-keigh. Or I will demonstrate my expertise in flaying victims alive, here and now."

traits.locale_text: {n}Das Wort 'Söldner' lässt Marazhais Augen zornig aufblitzen.{/n} "Vorsicht mit Eurer Wortwahl, Chem-Pan-Sey. Sonst zeige ich Euch hier und jetzt, wie erfahren ich darin bin, jemanden bei lebendigem Leib zu häuten."
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}À la mention du mot « mercenaire », le regard de Marazhai brûle soudain de fureur.{/n} « Attention aux termes que vous employez, mon-keigh, ou je vous montrerai toute l'étendue de mon savoir-faire en matière d'écorchement. »
languages.original_text: {n}The word "mercenary" causes Marazhai's eyes to flare in fury.{/n} "Careful with your choice of terms, mon-keigh. Or I will demonstrate my expertise in flaying victims alive, here and now."

traits.locale_text: {n}À la mention du mot « mercenaire », le regard de Marazhai brûle soudain de fureur.{/n} « Attention aux termes que vous employez, mon-keigh, ou je vous montrerai toute l'étendue de mon savoir-faire en matière d'écorchement. »
traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion

languages.text: {n}"Paralı asker" sözünü duyan Marazhai, birden köpürüyor.{/n} "Sözlerini dikkatle seç mon-keigh. Aksi hâlde deri yüzme uzmanlığımı şuracıkta sergileyeceğim."
languages.original_text: {n}The word "mercenary" causes Marazhai's eyes to flare in fury.{/n} "Careful with your choice of terms, mon-keigh. Or I will demonstrate my expertise in flaying victims alive, here and now."

traits.speaker: MarazhaiCompanion
